name: Black background : PitchDark companion - II
description:
This is a supplement to "Black background, light text : Pitch Dark companion - I" ( http://userstyles.org/styles/13864 ). It makes the menus more visible against the dark background by making them 3D. However if you have not installed PitchDark theme, you may not see any changes. Having the theme is essential for this companion, as opposed to companion-I that is why I have separated these things into two companions. This style is derived from  style 5286

For best results use this in conjunction with  style 13864  and with PitchDark theme ( https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/search?q=pitchdark&cat=all )

Will keep updated with improvements. Please write to me at np1 AT nirajp.8k.com if you spot any inconsistency.
additional_info:
Important Note : If you don't have PitchDark theme for firefox installed you may not see any change after you install this style.

Update : This style modifies PitchDark theme to make it much darker than the default dark greenish it originally has. The browser elements affected are Tabbar, Statusbar, Toolbar ... basically whatever is visible as the 'face' of the browser. Try the preview ... you will love it.

PS : In the screenshot shown below the fonts are also enlarged but it is not included by default in the style I am posting at this web site. If you like the larger fonts please uncomment the relevant code. It is marked with /*UNCOMMENT BELOW FOR LARGER FONTS*/. The reason I am not making it default is that my personal preference is for larger fonts which do not jell with some others.
